entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning late in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 07 January 2023
